edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.www
Class WWWQueryTranslator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.www.WWWQueryTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
WWWConstants
public class WWWQueryTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements WWWConstants

Translates an LSPQuery into a CGI request. The www_query.xsl stylsheet is required for this; it must reside in the SDARTS_HOME/config/backEndLSPName directory. The programmer must write this stylesheet; several examples are provided in the SDARTS distribution. XSL processing is performed with the Apache Xalan XSL processor.

The way the transformation works is as follows:

  • The LSPQuery is converted into its STARTS XML representation by calling its toXML method.
  • The STARTS XML is input into the Xalan XSL processor
  • The www_request.xsl stylesheet describes how to transform a STARTS <starts:squery> into a starts_intermediate document of the following form: 
          <starts:intermediate>
          <starts:script>
          <starts:url method='GET | POST'>
              http://www.google.com
          </starts:url>
          <starts:variable>
              <starts:name>search<starts:name>
              <starts:value>cardiovascular<starts:value>
          </starts:variable>
          <starts:variable> . . . . .
          </starts:script>
      </starts:intermediate>
  • This starts_intermediate XML is returned by Xalan as a sequence of SAX events. These events are processed by an instance of STARTSIntermediateHandler, which turns them into a HTTPRequest and returns it.
This class is not used for translating subsequent CGI requests found in the "more" button of an HTML results page; the WWWSession handles that. This class is only for translating the initial query coming from the FrontEndLSP.

Constructor Detail

WWWQueryTranslator

public WWWQueryTranslator(java.lang.String backEndLSPName)
                   throws BackEndException
Create a WWWQueryTranslator. The class needs to know the name of the BackEndLSP using it, in order to find the www_query.xsl stylsheet. The class loads the stylesheet and keeps it in a pre-compiled form.
Parameters:
backEndLSPName - the name of the BackEndLSP using this class
Method Detail

translate

public HTTPRequest translate(LSPQuery query)
                      throws BackEndException,
                             java.net.MalformedURLException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             org.xml.sax.SAXException
Converts an incoming LSPQuery into an HTTPRequest, which can then be invoked on the underlying web search engine collection
Parameters:
query - the query to translate
Returns:
an HTTPRequest to invoke the CGI-BIN script on the web server
